an9.83:0.3: 83. Weaknesses in Training and the Bases of Psychic Power
an9.83:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five weaknesses when you’re training.
an9.83:1.3: Killing living creatures, stealing, sexual misconduct, lying, and using alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an9.83:1.4: These are the five weaknesses when you’re training.
an9.83:2.1: To give up these five weaknesses in your training you should develop the four bases of psychic power.
an9.83:2.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm, and active effort.
an9.83:2.4: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to energy, and active effort.
an9.83:2.5: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to mental development, and active effort.
an9.83:2.6: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to inquiry, and active effort.
an9.83:2.7: To give up these five weaknesses in your training you should develop these four bases of psychic power.”
